definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
Collection of Yuefu Songs and Ballads, compiled in the 11th century by Guo Maoqian 郭茂倩[Guo1 Mao4 qian4]

sentences.english: His most recent poetry book is Amorous Poems, finished in 2004.
sentences.chinese: 楊煉最新之作爲2004年完成的豔情詩集《豔詩》。

sentences.english: The hymnal that mother gave me is containing more than 600 hymns.
sentences.chinese: 媽媽給我的那本讚美詩集裏面有600多首聖歌。

sentences.english: I chanced on a copy of the collection of Shakespeare's poems in the library.
sentences.chinese: 我在圖書館中偶然發現了一本莎士比亞詩集。

sentences.english: And who is to say that the poetry would have been worse?
sentences.chinese: 那麼誰會說詩集本身要比它更糟糕呢？

sentences.english: He wrote a book of poetry, and he was a both civil and military general.
sentences.chinese: 留有詩集一部，是住文武兼備的將軍。

sentences.english: Eldred wanted to post that collection in his free public library.
sentences.chinese: 艾爾綴德想把詩集放入他的免費圖書館。

sentences.english: Collection of poems being able to purchase Li Yu in where?
sentences.chinese: 在哪裏能買到李煜的詩集？

sentences.english: This is the 4th volume of Kong Fan-xing's poems.
sentences.chinese: 這是孔繁星發表的第四本詩集。

sentences.english: His poetry collections include: Poetry Extract and the Stream of Time.
sentences.chinese: 著有詩集《海外詩抄》及《時間之流》。

sentences.english: There are more than one hundred food poems in sushi's poetry.
sentences.chinese: 蘇軾詩集中有一百多首食品詩。

sentences.english: They handed patients hymnals and distributed programs.
sentences.chinese: 他們拿着病人的讚美詩集和安排任務。

sentences.english: The reason why Lu Xun named his essay collections of "wild grass" is by no means accidental.
sentences.chinese: 散文詩集《野草》被魯迅命名爲“野草”絕非偶然。

sentences.english: The book has become one of the largest-selling books of original verse in the UK in decades.
sentences.chinese: 此書成爲了上十年中英國最暢銷詩集。

sentences.english: Many a page at the outset of this Book, I am sure, is of no value.
sentences.chinese: 我確信，這本詩集開始的許多詩篇都是沒有價值的。

sentences.english: Have you read the gleanings of Yuan-ming's poems?
sentences.chinese: 你看過陶淵明的詩集嗎？

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
entire book/unabridged book/entire multi-volume work/comprehensive volume
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher
